= Analysis of UseR! 2011 participants by country =
Here is a little example how you can use the {{{googleVis}}} package to display the [http://www.warwick.ac.uk/statsdept/useR-2011/participant-list.html participants] of the [http://www.warwick.ac.uk/statsdept/useR-2011/ R user conference 2011 in Warwick] with a Geo Map (you could of course use a Geo Chart instead):
{{{
library(XML)
x=readHTMLTable(readLines("http://www.warwick.ac.uk/statsdept/useR-2011/participant-list.html"))
participants <- x[[1]]
names(participants)=c("Name", "Country", "Organisation")
## Correct typo:
participants$Country[participants$Country %in% "United Kngdom"]="United Kingdom"
participants$Country <- factor(participants$Country)
partCountry <- as.data.frame(xtabs( ~ Country, data=participants))
library(googleVis)
## Please note the option gvis.editor requires googleVis version >= 0.2.9
G <- gvisGeoMap(partCountry,"Country", "Freq", options=list(gvis.editor="Edit me") )
plot(G)
}}}
